Author: nopSaral team
Description: "This plugin allows you to product by zoom on product details page. please comment this line-- @await Html.PartialAsync("_ProductDetailsPictures", Model)" on path-- <your project>\Presentation\Nop.Web\Views\Product\ProductTemplate.Simple.cshtml. if you are using any theme then --<your project>\Presentation\Nop.Web\Themes\<your theme name>\Views\Product\ProductTemplate.Simple.cshtml.
